name: Trust the Owls
description:
WIP Only chapter 1 released. Description

A new soul has arrived in the midst of what many would call the most controversial family on the planet Ernin.  A child born with the hope of bringing change. Kalvanya, the kingdom in question, has gone to great lengths to make a name for itself.  Those in power, the Aniters, have taken notice of them, while those without power wait patiently for them to take wrong turn. Surrounded by mysteries and shaded secrets, what will happen to this new soul, knowing that both sides are watching this struggle. Ally with the Aniters and try to change the world, or let the world change and rule over you.

Features
  • Grow up in a dark fantasy world that spans from the end of the Middle Ages and beginning of the Early Modern Era.
  • Able to choose own name,  sex,  eye color, hair color, skin color, height, weight.
    • Characters will react to your appearance and make comments based on their personalities and judgment. (they will gradually appear as you grow up)
  • Despite your authentic ancestors and current family, you'll possess the ability to be evil, neutral, or kind - or perhaps all of them at the same time and confuse everyone. Expect people to be disappointed by your choices.
  • There will be no personality stats. Characters will make comments based on your previous decision, all depending on their on personalities and judgement.
  • Romance will play a part in the latter chapters, with four main love interests and multiple flings along the way. You'll meet two main love interests while growing up. 
  • Ability to influence some characters, turning evil characters towards the right path or attempting to corrupt kindhearted individuals.
  • Choose one of the 5 Elements that will join in your adventures all over the beautiful world of Ernin.
  • Eventually, follow your true destiny and become a ruler, as it's in your rights.

Game is character driven and the dialogue will be shaped by your age. As the MC grows, the inner monologue will change, and many of the scenes will be more descriptive.

There are and will be: general mature topics, gore, slavery, racism, upsetting scenarios. Rating will be 18+.
